de.2025_july_created_at_custom_field_descri: Sie k√∂nnen jetzt ein benutzerdefiniertes Feld erstellen, das das Erstellungsdatum f√ºr einen Datensatz automatisch festlegt.
de.2025_july_file_preview_download_activity: Dateien, die in der Aktivit√§t des Datensatzes angezeigt werden, k√∂nnen jetzt direkt in der Aktivit√§ts√ºbersicht des Datensatzes angezeigt und heruntergeladen werden, ohne den Datensatz zu verlassen.
Dateivorschau und Download in der Aktivit√§tsaufzeichnung
de.2025_july_improved_list_grouping_order_d: Verbesserte die Reihenfolge der Listengruppierung in der Datenbankansicht - die Anordnung von oben nach unten entspricht jetzt der Anordnung von links nach rechts auf Kanban-Boards.
de.2025_july_improved_list_grouping_order_t: Verbesserte Reihenfolge der Listengruppierung in der Datenbank
de.2025_july_multi_homing_records_beta_desc: Haben Sie denselben Datensatz in mehreren Projekten mit synchronisierten benutzerdefinierten Felddaten und einheitlichen Kommentaren.
de.2025_july_project_name_email_variables_d: Projektname-Unterst√ºtzung f√ºr E-Mail-Automatisierungsvariablen hinzugef√ºgt, sodass Sie den Projektnamen in automatisierten E-Mails einf√ºgen k√∂nnen.
de.2025_july_relative_due_date_triggers_des: Erstellen Sie Automatisierungs-Trigger basierend auf relativen F√§lligkeitsterminen (z. B. 1 Tag vor F√§lligkeit, 1 Woche nach F√§lligkeit) f√ºr eine flexiblere Workflow-Automatisierung.
de.2025_july_sequential_ids_advanced_filter: Sequentielle IDs werden jetzt in der erweiterten Filterung unterst√ºtzt, sodass Sie Datens√§tze nach ihren einzigartigen Sequenznummern filtern k√∂nnen.
Unterst√ºtzung f√ºr sequenzielle IDs in erweiterten Filtern
de.2025_june_admin_role_management_descript: Administratoren k√∂nnen jetzt die Rollen anderer Administratoren √§ndern, was eine flexiblere Verwaltung von Berechtigungen erm√∂glicht.
de.2025_june_created_at_custom_field_descri: Sie k√∂nnen jetzt ein benutzerdefiniertes Feld erstellen, das das Erstellungsdatum f√ºr einen Datensatz automatisch festlegt.
de.2025_june_delete_permissions_for_custom_: L√∂schen von Berechtigungen f√ºr benutzerdefinierte Benutzerrollen gew√§hren oder einschr√§nken
de.2025_june_enhanced_cover_images_descript: Deaktivieren Sie Coverbilder projektweit, legen Sie Quelldaten (Kommentare, benutzerdefinierte Dateifelder, Beschreibung) fest und konfigurieren Sie Seitenverh√§ltnisse.
de.2025_june_export_charts_as_csv_descripti: Eine neue Option wurde zu einzelnen Diagrammen hinzugef√ºgt, um Multi-Projekt-Diagramme in eine einheitliche CSV mit kombinierten benutzerdefinierten Felddaten exportieren zu k√∂nnen.
de.2025_june_file_renaming_description: Sie k√∂nnen Dateien jetzt direkt in Blue umbenennen.
de.2025_june_multi_homing_records_beta_desc: Haben Sie denselben Datensatz in mehreren Projekten mit synchronisierten benutzerdefinierten Felddaten und einheitlichen Kommentaren.
de.2025_june_new_file_platform_description: Wechsel von AWS S3 zu B2 f√ºr erh√∂hte Bandbreite; Dateien werden jetzt in Deutschland gehostet.
de.2025_june_reference_field_support_for_ba: Blue unterst√ºtzt jetzt die Verwendung von Referenzfeldern f√ºr die X-Achse von Balkendiagrammen.
de.2025_june_restrict_record_completion_des: Steuern, welche benutzerdefinierten Rollen Benutzer Datens√§tze als abgeschlossen markieren k√∂nnen.
de.2025_june_support_for_multiple_email_aut: Jetzt kann ein Automatisierungsausl√∂ser bis zu 5 E-Mails anstelle von zuvor 1 senden.
de.2025_june_wiki_docs_in_templates_descrip: Projektvorlagen enthalten jetzt Wiki-Seiten und Dokumentationen, um sicherzustellen, dass Wissen erhalten bleibt, wenn neue Projekte aus Vorlagen erstellt werden.
de.2025_june_zapier_integration_description: Verbinden Sie Blue mit Tausenden von Apps √ºber unsere neue Zapier-Integration.
de.2025_march_faster_dashboard_charts_descr: Wir haben die Diagramme auf unserem Dashboard schneller und reaktionsschneller gemacht.
de.2025_march_record_color_now_shows_on_dat: Die Farbe eines Datensatzes wird jetzt in der Datenbankansicht angezeigt.
Farbcode wird jetzt in der Datenbankansicht angezeigt
de.2025_march_sort_database_view_by_date_cu: Sie k√∂nnen die Datenbankansicht jetzt nach einem benutzerdefinierten Feld sortieren, das ein Datum enth√§lt.
de.2025_march_sort_database_view_by_single_: Sie k√∂nnen jetzt die Datenbankansicht nach einzelnen und mehreren benutzerdefinierten Feldern sortieren.
Datenbankansicht nach Einzel- und Mehrfachauswahl benutzerdefiniertem Feld sortieren
de.2025_march_time_in_list_description: Wir haben eine neue Funktion hinzugef√ºgt, die Ihnen anzeigt, wie lange ein Datensatz in jeder Liste war.
de.2025_march_upgraded_create_and_update_re: Jetzt k√∂nnen Sie Datens√§tze √ºber die API erstellen und aktualisieren, w√§hrend Sie gleichzeitig benutzerdefinierte Felder erstellen und aktualisieren.
Aktualisierte APIs zum Erstellen und Aktualisieren von Datens√§tzen
de.2025_march_upgraded_email_infrastructure: Wir haben unsere E-Mail-Infrastruktur auf einen zuverl√§ssigeren und skalierbareren Anbieter umgestellt.
de.2025_may_custom_field_folders_descriptio: Benutzerdefinierte Felder k√∂nnen jetzt in Ordnern organisiert werden, was die Verwaltung und Auffindbarkeit erleichtert.
de.2025_may_lookup_unique_ids_description: Sie k√∂nnen jetzt eindeutige IDs projekt√ºbergreifend nachschlagen.
de.2025_may_make_com_integration_descriptio: Eine native Make-Anwendung, die es Ihnen erm√∂glicht, Daten zu und von Make zu senden.
de.2025_may_tag_based_permissions_engine_de: Zeige/verbirgt Datens√§tze basierend auf den vorhandenen Tags.
de.2025_october_custom_fields_activity_filt: Alle benutzerdefinierten Felder werden jetzt in Aktivit√§tsfiltern unterst√ºtzt, sodass Sie eine genauere Kontrolle dar√ºber haben, welche Aktivit√§ten Sie sehen.
de.2025_october_n8n_integration_description: Verbinden Sie Blue mit n8n, um leistungsstarke Workflow-Automatisierungen √ºber Hunderte von Anwendungen und Diensten zu erstellen.
de.2025_october_restrict_record_completion_: Benutzerdefinierte Benutzerrollen k√∂nnen jetzt Benutzer daran hindern, Datens√§tze abzuschlie√üen, um eine ordnungsgem√§√üe Workflow-Kontrolle zu gew√§hrleisten.
Einschr√§nkung der Datensatzabschl√ºsse in benutzerdefinierten Rollen
de.2025_october_unassigned_filter_descripti: Neue 'Unassigned'-Filteroption f√ºr Zuweisungsfilter erleichtert das Finden von Datens√§tzen ohne Zuweisungen.
de.2025_september_bulk_actions_automations_: Bulk-Aktionen k√∂nnen jetzt Automatisierungen f√ºr bis zu 1.000 Datens√§tze gleichzeitig ausl√∂sen (nur Enterprise-Pl√§ne)
de.2025_september_button_custom_field_color: Benutzerdefinierte Farben f√ºr benutzerdefinierte Schaltfl√§chenfelder festlegen, um sie hervorzuheben und an Ihren Workflow anzupassen.
de.2025_september_checklist_assignment_noti: Checklist-Zuweisungen haben jetzt eine separate Benachrichtigungseinstellung, die es Ihnen erm√∂glicht, diese Benachrichtigungen unabh√§ngig zu steuern.
de.2025_september_delete_files_folders_perm: Benutzerdefinierte Benutzerrollen k√∂nnen jetzt Berechtigungen enthalten, um Benutzer daran zu hindern, Dateien und Ordner zu l√∂schen.
Berechtigung zum L√∂schen von Dateien/Ordnern f√ºr benutzerdefinierte Benutzerrollen
de.2025_september_forms_assignee_dropdown_d: Formulare unterst√ºtzen jetzt Zuweisungen als Dropdown-Auswahlfeld, was die Zuweisung von Aufgaben √ºber Formular√ºbermittlungen erleichtert.
de.2025_september_hide_default_fields_descr: Benutzerdefinierte Benutzerrollen k√∂nnen jetzt Standardfelder f√ºr Benutzer ausblenden, wodurch die Benutzeroberfl√§che f√ºr bestimmte Rollen vereinfacht wird.
de.2025_september_time_in_list_advanced_fil: Die Zeit im Listenfeld wird jetzt in erweiterten Filtern unterst√ºtzt, sodass Sie Datens√§tze basierend darauf filtern k√∂nnen, wie lange sie sich in einer bestimmten Liste befinden.
Zeit im Listenfeld in erweiterten Filtern
de.page_subtitle: Alles, was wir seit dem ersten Tag ausgeliefert haben.

en.2018_april_start_description: We've started building Blue. We're excited at the possibility of helping people change the way they work for the better
en.2018_august_file_uploads_description: We now support the uploading of files to any discussions/Record/comment. You get unlimited storage, with maximum file size of 100mb per file
en.2018_august_mentions_description: Need to give a teammate a heads up? Now you can by mentioning them in comments using @mentions! You'll automagically see a list of suggestions based on what you're typing and the people in the project
en.2018_december_performance_improvements_d: We took some time away from building new stuff to ensure that Blue stays as fast as ever
en.2018_december_pretty_urls_description: Now all URLs are completely human readable and friendly to the eyes, which means that when you share a link with someone, they can instantly tell where that will lead
en.2018_july_boards_description: Now you can track Records list across a board and build your own processes to keep everything in check. This is hands-down the best way to ensure that work keeps flowing in the right direction
en.2018_july_mobile_app_beta_description: We've released the beta versions of both Android and iOS mobile apps for our users to try. Being able to work on-the-go is important, as it stops you having to be stuck in the office!
en.2018_june_infinite_scroll_description: Nobody likes trying to remember what page something is on. With infinite scroll, we keep loading all your information for you as your scroll down the page
en.2018_june_projects_description: Now you can create projects to keep things neat and tidy, and the cool thing is, each Blue accounts comes with an unlimited amount of projects!
en.2018_june_status_updates_description: Keeping on top of what's going on is important. With status updates, you can see what others have been up to as well as post your own updates
en.2018_may_discussions_description: Now you can start and reply to discussions in Blue. Communication is the most important aspect of teamwork, and now you can do it right inside Blue
en.2018_may_passwordless_sign_in_descriptio: We now support passwordless sign in for Blue. This is the safest way to login to an application as it doesn't require you to remember anything
en.2018_november_automatic_30_day_backups_d: We now backup all data everyday for 30 days, so you can sleep well at night knowing everything is as safe as it can be
en.2018_november_notifications_v1_descripti: Both browser and mobile notifications for a whole different bunch of actions, so you can stay on top of your work
en.2018_october_people_search_description: If a project has a large number of people, you'll now find that a handy real-time search bar appears to help you find who you're looking for in the People page :)
en.2018_october_project_and_global_activity: Each project now has a timeline of everything that has happened. Also, you can see a timeline of your entire company and see what's been going on across all your projects
en.2018_september_multiple_companies_descri: Now you can have the ability to switch between multiple companies, each with their own projects and people
en.2018_september_team_management_descripti: Add and remove people from projects, and give them different permissions to ensure everyone can see and do what they need to!
en.2019_april_company_management_descriptio: Team management across the entire company, as well as the ability to upload your company logo and change company
en.2019_april_date_filters_for_activity_des: We've added the ability to filter both the project and global activity by date, which is great if you want to know what happened at a particular point in time in a project
en.2019_april_increased_maximum_file_size_d: We've just increased the maximum allowed file size from 100mb to 500mb. Feel free to uploads those large schematics, videos, photo collections, and anything else you want
en.2019_april_multi_language_description: Giving the ability for people to have Blue in their own native language! Khmer & Vietnamese are the first on the list
en.2019_april_upload_videos_on_ios_descript: You can now post videos into any discussions, comment, or Record directly via the iOS app
en.2019_august_beta_testing_website_descrip: You can now visit [https://beta.app.blue.cc](https://beta.app.blue.cc/) and login with your usual details to access all the upcoming features and give them a try!
en.2019_august_leave_a_project_description: Yeah...we didn't have this before and you had to ask others to kick you out of a project. Now we do, and you can leave by yourself if you need!
en.2019_august_per_action_notification_sett: Choose which actions should give you notifications, so you can roll your own completed customizable notifications preferences
en.2019_august_search_inside_comments_descr: We've upgrade our already-powerful search engine to have the ability to search within any comments made on any Record, discussions, or update!
en.2019_august_someone_is_writing_indicator: It's annoying when you post a comment and someone immediately posts before or after you, and you cross the discussions and causes confusion. Now you can see if someone is writing at the same time as you are, so you can better judge when you should post
en.2019_december_android_app_description: Now Android users can enjoy the same benefits as iOS users. We have a new shiny app that has all the features you need, while giving a fast way to access Blue while on the go
en.2019_december_assignees_faces_on_cards_d: One glance is all it takes to see which members are assigned to a task, unless your members decide not to add their pictures, which is also fine
en.2019_december_checklists_description: Sometimes a Record may come with other small tasks that need to be completed, and you can now add checklists inside to avoid missing small details
en.2019_december_improved_record_interface_: Nothing beats design that embraces simplicity; Blue's updated interface makes Records look more organized, and now you can move your Record across different columns through a dropdown option
en.2019_february_filter_completed_records_d: When a project has been going on for a while, it can fill up with old completed Records that you don't really need to see all the time. Now you can filter them away to keep things focussed
en.2019_february_mac_windows_app_descriptio: We've launched both the Mac and Windows applications. These can be installed via Google Chrome
en.2019_february_realtime_description: Anytime you do something, such as posting a new comment, it is instantly updated across both the web and mobile applications
en.2019_february_realtime_keyword_filters_d: Now you can filters across all Records in a project by typing for the name, and we'll automatically hide all Records that don't match that search result
en.2019_january_record_filters_sorting_desc: When you've got a lot of Records in a project it can get difficult to find things. Now you can filter by whether a Record has been completed, due dates within a date range, and also who's been assigned to the Record. And if you need to sort you Records, you can also do so!
en.2019_january_self_sign_up_description: Now anyone with an email address can sign up to Blue, from anywhere in the world
en.2019_july_billing_description: We've got secure payments built right inside our app, as we like to get paid, you know ;)
en.2019_july_drag_drop_projects_description: You're now able to reorder the projects in your sidebar to put the projects that are most important to you at the top of the list
en.2019_july_per_project_notifications_desc: Choose which projects should give you notifications, and which projects should stay quiet, so you can focus on what's important to you
en.2019_july_speed_boost_description: Blue was already quite fast, but we've made it over 50% faster!
en.2019_july_upgraded_design_description: We've upgraded Blue to the latest Material Design 2 guidelines
en.2019_june_auto_saving_drafts_description: Every message you write on our web or desktop applications now automatically save as you type, even if you close Blue and reopen it later. This ensures that you never lose anything mid-sentence!
en.2019_june_gallery_for_photos_description: Now when you click on a photo on a comment, you'll be presented the photo in a gallery view and you can browse through all the other photos in that Record or message
en.2019_june_my_records_description: Keeping track of your responsibilities just got a whole lot easier! We now collect all your assigned Records across all your projects in one, so you can easily see what's on your plate
en.2019_june_offline_mode_for_ios_descripti: You can now use Blue on iOS while offline, and still see all your important data that you've previously looked at. That's great for long haul flights, or whenever the internet is not behaving itself ;)
en.2019_june_real_time_search_description: Now you can search through all your Record, discussions, files, and updates from the top navigation bar. You'll never need to worry about where something was stored ever again
en.2019_march_browser_notifications_reminde: If you're wondering why you're not getting notifications, we now remind you to turn them on in your browsers so you can get the best from Blue (and your team!)
en.2019_march_icons_for_most_common_file_ty: Blue comes with unlimited storage, so it's great to add all your different file types!  We now have custom icons for over 40 of the most common file types, so your files will look ever better once they're on Blue!
Icons for Most Common File Types
en.2019_march_ios_app_released_description: Now our iOS app is out of the beta and on the App Store for anyone to download
en.2019_march_pending_invitation_management: When you invite lots of new people to a project, it can be difficult to remember who's been invited when, and sometimes people lose the invitations. Now you easily manage any invitations that have been sent, including extending the invitation as well as cancelling it
en.2019_may_drag_and_drop_columns_on_ios_de: Now you can move board columns around on iOS. Simply long press on a column and it will pop out, and you can drag and drop to reorder your processes or Record lists
en.2019_may_drag_and_drop_columns_on_ios_ti: Drag and Drop Columns on iOS
en.2019_may_email_notifications_for_mention: When someone mentions you in a Record or comments, it normally means that it's quite important. Now we will email you to tell you to check out what was said
en.2019_may_emails_to_aws_ses_description: We're now sending emails from AWS SES, which means they are less likely to end up in your spam, and you should also see emails being delivered immediately
en.2019_may_play_videos_in_blue_description: Now when you upload a video file in Blue, we'll automatically turn that into a player so everyone can view the video without needing to download the file!
en.2019_may_upload_files_multiple_photos_on: We've built on top of the photo upload feature to add the ability to upload any file via iOS and also to select multiple photos and upload them all at the same time
Upload Files & Multiple Photos on iOS
en.2019_november_copy_move_records_descript: If you've ever needed to move or copy Records across projects...well you're in luck, because now you can!
en.2019_november_date_ranges_for_records_de: Sometimes, Records don't just have a due date, but have a particular timeframe during which they need to be worked on. Now, you can set both start dates and due dates for Recordsl
en.2019_november_file_management_descriptio: Forget about Dropbox or Google Drive, you can now see all files uploaded in your project, and also store files separately from tasks and comments, as well as download multiple files at the same time
en.2019_october_bigger_maximum_file_size_de: We've now increased the maximum file size to 2GB, which is great for large design files, marketing videos, and more. Uploads are also even faster, and you can drag and drop anywhere on the browser to upload files
en.2019_october_emoji_support_description: Sometimes words are not enough, and that's why you can now search through Emojis to the find the perfect one to express what you want to say!
en.2019_october_per_project_notification_in: You'll now see a number next to each project on the sidebar, indicating how many new things have happened since you last checked
en.2019_october_resources_on_the_sidebar_de: We've added useful links to the sidebar to download our apps, learning videos, and more!
en.2019_october_sticky_toolbar_description: For those extra long comments or descriptions, the toolbar now sticks to the top of the screen so you always have the tools at your disposal
en.2019_october_tags_description: If you track related but separate groups of tasks in one project, you'll now be able to color-code them and also filter them out to get a clearer overall picture
en.2019_september_calendars_description: Being able to view Records in a calendar format brings about lots of advantages, and it is perfect for things like editorial calendars, social media posting schedules, and more!
en.2019_september_discussion_list_improveme: We've made the discussion list much easier to navigate, especially if you have a large number of long discussions!
en.2019_september_mark_all_records_in_colum: You can now mark an entire column on a board as done with two clicks. This is helpful when you've got a long list that's complete and you don't want to mark each item as done one by one
Mark All Records in Column as Done
en.2019_september_record_history_descriptio: It's key to be able to see the full history of each Record, from when it was created, to which column it was moved to, to any name changes, due date changes, and more
en.2019_september_someone_is_writing_indica: It's annoying when you post a comment and someone immediately posts before or after you, and you cross the discussions and causes confusion. Now you can see if someone is writing at the same time as you are, so you can better judge when you should post
en.2020_april_custom_fields_description: This new feature allows you to customize your Record fields. In addition to adding a due date or assignee to your Record, you can add specific fields for phone numbers, URLs, emails, currency, and more
en.2020_april_dark_mode_description: You can now feel at ease when working at night or in the dark
en.2020_april_mention_page_description: This is your go-to place for all @mentions you get from comments, Records, updates, discussions, and across different projects and company
en.2020_august_grid_view_description: Now the default view on files has switched from a list to a grid, with built in preview of common files, and a handy button to switch back to list view as required!
en.2020_august_record_checklists_on_ios_and: Create checklists, assign people, and set a due date to checklist items right from your Blue app
en.2020_december_additional_templates_descr: We've added new templates for onboarding new employees, reading lists, meeting notes, and user research
en.2020_december_built_in_gifs_description: Sometimes, the best way to communicate is with an animated cat :)
en.2020_december_import_export_records_desc: Import and export Records via CSV files. This works with all custom fields and supports up to 100,000 Records at a time!
en.2020_december_improved_rickroll_descript: We've linked directly to 43 seconds into the video, because we're never gunna give you up
en.2020_february_company_calendar_descripti: Before you could only turn on Calendar View for Projects, now you can see all that happens within your company across multiple projects in the Company Calendar. Big picture planning gets simple!
en.2020_february_fullscreen_mode_descriptio: To limit the amount of distractions presented by the digital noise, you can now view your boards in Fullscreen and go into deep focus
en.2020_february_performance_improvements_d: We've made Blue even faster and more reliable
en.2020_january_ability_to_leave_company_de: We've added a feature that allows you to remove yourself from a company. But don't forget to say bye!
en.2020_january_archive_projects_descriptio: Long list of projects on your workspace can be overwhelming; our new update gives you option to archive completed or projects you simply want to hide in the time being
en.2020_january_improved_board_ui_and_loadi: We've removed all shadows from Record cards and created a cleaner view of your workspace. Small changes in drag & drop shadows, loading views, and little touches this and there,  and voila... your new Blue work station!
en.2020_july_new_android_app_description: Android has received some love with a new update that add lots of new features, improved offline support, and generally makes using an Android phone a pleasure :)
en.2020_july_new_ios_app_description: Our iOS has had a new release that add lots of new functionality like archived projects, tags, Record history, and lots and lots of performance improvements. We've also updated the interface to bring it in line with Apple's latest interface guidelines
en.2020_june_improvements_to_web_app_descri: We've made significant performance improvements for our web app to cope with the increased usage across our customer base, and we've made the real-time data updates more... real-time!
en.2020_march_change_user_access_level_desc: Before, you would have to remove the person and add them back in with the new access level. Now you can directly change their access level in People Management
en.2020_march_list_view_description: Adding to Boards and Calendar View, this new feature allows you to view your Records in a list format.  And you can check your Records off as you go, like checklists
en.2020_march_view_comment_only_description: You can now give people access to only view the details of a project or only comment
en.2020_may_assignee_due_dates_on_checklist: Now, you have the ability to assign an individual checklist item to team members, and also set start and due dates! This is great for more granular project planning
en.2020_may_updated_dashboard_interface_des: Once you log into Blue, now you see a more organized and clean-looking dashboard that allows quick access to recent projects right on top, followed by your active companies, and inactive ones
en.2020_november_built_in_support_descripti: You can now access our support team right within Blue. Our help widget automagically suggest relevant help guide content based on the feature you're on, and you can reach out to our team via live chat or email directly within Blue
en.2020_november_dark_mode_on_android_descr: Now our Android app supports dark mode. Sync it up with your phone settings or choose your always-on favorite theme
en.2020_november_improved_record_filter_int: We've significantly improved the interface for Record filtering, now you have one less click for all actions and you can see exactly what's filtered at a glance
en.2020_october_automations_description: Take your productivity to the next level by automating common actions. Create triggers based on actions like assigning people, moving Records, and setting due dates, and automatically take actions
en.2020_october_dark_mode_on_ios_descriptio: Now our iOS app supports dark mode. Sync it up with your phone settings or choose your always-on favorite theme
en.2020_september_project_templates_descrip: Whether you're hiring new people, kick starting sales, or planning an event, we've got a template to get you going to record time
en.2020_september_unread_mentions_filters_d: Now if you've got a lot of @mentions during the day, you can filters just by the ones you haven't read to stay on top of things
en.2021_april_files_in_mobile_apps_descript: Our mobile apps now support browsing and previewing through all the files in your projects
en.2021_april_new_currencies_description: We have added support for new currencies including the British pound, Philippine Peso, Ethereum and Bitcoin
en.2021_april_spanish_language_description: Hola! Spanish language is now available! We've got a few more languages coming soon
en.2021_august_calendar_sync_description: One way sync to gCal, iCal, and Outlook
en.2021_august_copy_record_url_description: A quick and easy way to copy the URL of a Record when you're using our web app
en.2021_august_custom_field_filters_descrip: New advanced stackable filters for various custom fields
en.2021_august_custom_interface_colors_desc: You are able to change the interface color of Blue to be something other than blue!
en.2021_august_safer_project_deletion_descr: We're improving the project deletion workflow to include an additional step for safety ‚Äî so you'll never delete an entire project by accident
en.2021_december_file_folders_description: You can create nested folders to organize your files in a logical manner
en.2021_december_new_authentication_system_: We have implemented a new authentication system that removes the use of cookies and improves security. It also sets up for Single Sign On in 2022
en.2021_december_speed_improvements_descrip: We've made major software optimizations to Blue to make it 300% faster. Things feel instant right now
en.2021_february_forms_description: You can now create multiple forms for each project, and pick and choose which custom fields to enable to build your perfect forms. Share these outside of Blue and watch the entries automatically become Records in your projects
en.2021_february_my_records_v2_description: Now your Records are automatically categorized by what's coming up soon and what's late, helping you keep track of what you have to get done
en.2021_february_searchable_tags_descriptio: Now you can easily search for tags when tagging Records, perfect for projects where you have lots and lots of tags
en.2021_february_timezone_aware_description: Blue now automatically detects your timezone and ensures reminders are sent at the right time
en.2021_february_updated_client_permissions: Clients can no longer delete other people's Records in projects or create new lists in projects
en.2021_january_import_export_v2_descriptio: We've added custom field management including in that we also added new fields; currency, selection, and tag for a faster mapping process! Additionally, the ability to auto-assign headers based on the column names making it easier for you!
en.2021_january_location_custom_field_descr: You can now add multiple location custom fields to a Record. You can search for a place, drag and drop a pin on a map, or just enter the coordinates if you have them in hand
en.2021_january_map_view_description: If you're using the location custom field, you can now switch views and see all your Records in a map. This is great to view customer addresses, location of equipment, and more!
en.2021_january_new_currencies_description: Due to lots of requests, we've added a whole bunch of new currencies that are now supported by our custom fields. Hello to Brazil, India, Korean, and a few other countries! :)
en.2021_july_all_users_can_see_project_deta: We now show the project description to all users, not just administrators
All Users Can See Project Details
en.2021_july_checklist_notifications_descri: Now you can receive notifications on changes to individual checklist items ‚Äî just the same way you get notifications about Records
en.2021_july_deleted_records_logs_descripti: We now keep a log on project activities of all delete Records
en.2021_july_filter_and_selection_usability: We know surface already select items at the top of the list for assignees and filters, and custom fields selections are now ordered by usage across our entire user base
en.2021_july_people_page_real_time_improvem: No our people page updates in real-time for role changes, new invites, and users who accept invites
en.2021_july_social_proof_on_signup_page_de: We now showcase the total number of registered companies on the Sign Up and Sign In pages!
en.2021_june_birthday_tracking_description: You can add your birthday in your profile, and we will remind the company owner to buy you a present ;)
en.2021_june_change_email_description: It's been more than 3 years, but now you can finally change your email without asking us to do it for you! ;)
en.2021_june_file_upload_for_forms_descript: Forms now support the custom field for file uploads, which means you can use forms for things like CV uploads, projects briefs, and more
en.2021_june_german_language_description: Hallo! German language is now available in our  app across the world. Danke!
en.2021_june_project_folders_description: Group your projects in the sidebar with color-coded folders for better organization. Perfect when you have dozens of projects on the go
en.2021_march_automation_notifications_desc: Now you can receive notifications each time something happens via an automation. This is a great way to stay up to date with what's happening
en.2021_march_duplicate_projects_descriptio: You can now copy an entire project in a few clicks. Copy the entire thing, or pick and choose what you want to copy across
en.2021_march_project_templates_description: Take process to the next level by creating your own templates! These will be available to all your team members, so you can keep work consistent and save time
en.2021_may_api_description: Every single action that you can do in Blue is available via our API. This is a beta feature so its not yet recommended for mission-critical processes
en.2021_may_custom_field_for_files_descript: You can now create custom fields that support adding multiple files at the same time. This is great for creating a more structured process for uploading documents and feedback
en.2021_may_improved_tags_description: We've increased the number of tag colors from 16 to 20 and improved the color palette to be easier on the eyes
en.2021_november_5_new_languages_descriptio: üá¨üá™üá≠üá∫üá∏üá™üá∑üá¥üá®üáøWe're happy to announce that Blue is now available in Georgian , Hungarian, Swedish, Romanian, and Czech! We now have a total of 15 languages available which actually broke our language selection component, so we redesigned that as well :)
en.2021_november_assigned_checklist_items_t: You can now get a complete overview of what you need to get done, because we show both Records and checklist items under \
Assigned checklist items to show in My Records
en.2021_november_country_custom_fields_desc: We noticed lots of customers creating their own country lists using custom fields, so now there is a specific custom fields that provides a multi-select list of every country in the world without you having to input each one manually
en.2021_november_preview_audio_description: When you upload an audio file into a comment, you'll now be able to play it directly within Blue instead of having to download it
en.2021_november_youtube_video_embeds_descr: When you drop a YouTube link in a comment or a Record description, we will embed the YouTube video player right in so everyone catch watch the video inside of Blue
en.2021_october_custom_links_description: The ability for company owners to add useful links to the sidebar, and choose whether clients should see them or not
en.2021_october_edit_comments_description: Sometimes you need to go back and edit something you wrote. Now you can, and you'll see a small \
en.2021_october_log_deleted_records_descrip: We now keep track of who deleted which Records ‚Äî which brings further transparency into Blue
en.2021_october_new_onboarding_emails_descr: Each time a new user joins Blue, they will now receive a series of emails to help them get on board
en.2021_october_record_comment_audit_filter: Sometimes Records can get cluttered with comments and activity items. You can now filters what you want to see. This is automagically saved as your default view across all projects and Records
en.2021_september_community_translation_des: We've launched the ability for anyone to translate Blue into their own native language
en.2021_september_dark_mode_improvements_de: Everyone loves dark mode, now we've made it even better
en.2021_september_database_view_description: A completely new way to view your project data. Filter, sort, and splice your data in database view, where each custom field becomes a column
en.2021_september_repeating_records_descrip: Repeat Records on your schedule and create even better processes in your organization
en.2021_september_security_enhancements_des: As the number of organizations using Blue keeps growing, we took some time out to have a security audit and enhance the level of protection that we provide customers
en.2022_april_improved_billing_portal_alpha: A new portal that allows our customers to add tax information, download previous invoices/receipts, and update their payment details
en.2022_april_project_folders_on_mobile_des: Project folders are now supported on both iOS and Android mobile applications
en.2022_april_start_and_due_times_descripti: You can set start times and due times for Records to get an extra level of accuracy on when something needs to get done. This opens us a large number of new use cases for Blue
en.2022_august_better_looking_user_guide_de: We took our and gave it a facelift
en.2022_august_better_notification_emails_d: We now show the contents of the comments that trigger an email notification directly within an email ‚Äî so you no longer need to click to see what was said
en.2022_august_embedded_translations_descri: We now have automatic deployment of our new translations directly from the translation management system
en.2022_august_global_database_description: To support our customers in over 125 countries, we have launched global synced databased in the United States, Europe, and Asia Pacific. This provides another layer of redundancy, and even faster access speeds ‚Äî regardless of where in the world you're based!
en.2022_august_mention_records_description: Previously, you could only mention people. Now, you can also easily reference another Record by using typing @@ and then searching for a Record
en.2022_august_russian_portuguese_descripti: Privet and Ol√° ‚Äî Blue is now available in both Russian and Portuguese
en.2022_august_share_files_with_public_link: Create a shareable public link to any file in Blue
en.2022_august_wiki_description: Each project has its own infinite Wiki, a place where you can store your project knowledge! This includes an automatically updating table of contents of easy navigation
en.2022_december_automation_send_email_desc: A new automation that can send emails from Blue based on any available trigger
en.2022_december_telegram_custom_field_alph: We now have a dedicated custom field for Telegram, the popular messaging application. This means you can add telegram IDs and instantly open Telegram from Blue
en.2022_december_updated_completed_filters_: We've redesigned our complete/incomplete filter to improve usability, and now you can show all Records, or just complete or incomplete Records
en.2022_february_add_web_links_to_checklist: We now support web links than open in a new tab within checklist items
en.2022_february_bulk_edit_records_descript: You can bulk assign, tag, and move Records in any list
en.2022_february_hide_user_emails_descripti: Project administrators can now choose to hide all user emails within a project, or just for clients
en.2022_february_performance_improvements_d: We've been making large upgrades to our underlining libraries, future proofing Blue so we can continue to innovate for the long-term
en.2022_february_project_settings_descripti: Project administrators now have a specific area to manage project-specific settings
en.2022_february_sign_in_alerts_description: If we detect an unusual sign-in attempt to your Blue account, we now send you an alert email to make sure it was really you
en.2022_january_embeddable_forms_descriptio: We now provide an easy way to copy the HTML code required to embed Blue forms directly into your website ‚Äî collecting data has never been so easy
en.2022_january_new_currencies_description: We are bringing support for the Pakistani Rupee and the Nigerian Naira!
en.2022_january_toggle_project_features_alp: You can decide which features in a project you want to enable or disable
en.2022_july_better_transactional_emails_de: We have now split out our service for transactional emails to improve email deliverability ‚Äî ensuring you get your notifications each time
en.2022_july_intelligent_traffic_routing_de: Speed is our priority, and we now intelligently route our internet traffic across the world based on each individual customer's location, ensuring faster load times for everyone
en.2022_july_upgraded_infrastructure_descri: As part of our global scaling efforts, we have deployed the Blue web application on over 270 data centers worldwide, enabling us to reach 95% of world's population in less than 50ms
en.2022_june_add_records_from_the_bottom_de: Sometimes you want to add Records from the top, sometimes from bottom. Now you can do both
en.2022_june_bulk_add_items_description: Copy and paste from a spreadsheet or a list to bulk create lists, Records, checklists, and checklist items
en.2022_june_copy_forms_description: You could not copy forms between projects, and now you can!
en.2022_june_hello_blue_description: We are changing our name from Bloo to Blue!
en.2022_june_new_currencies_description: We have added another 15+ currencies to Blue to support users from across the globe
en.2022_june_tags_for_forms_description: You can select tags to be automatically applied to form entries for specific forms
en.2022_june_updated_board_design_descripti: We have updated our board view, to make it even easier on the eyes
en.2022_march_change_company_url_alpha_desc: Previously you had to contact support to change your company URL, now you can do this yourself!
en.2022_march_reminders_description: Snooze any Record and get a email or push reminder at a later date
en.2022_march_set_company_color_description: The company owner can enforce an interface color for all users in his company
en.2022_march_sort_by_custom_fields_in_data: When in database view, you can now sort any of the columns that are custom fields
Sort by Custom Fields in Database View
en.2022_may_change_company_url_description: If you need to change your Blue organizational URL, this is now possible!
en.2022_may_credit_card_for_free_trials_des: All future free trials will require credit cards. This helps us keep the platform spam free and ensures that we can focus on making Blue constantly better
en.2022_may_improved_activity_filters_descr: Project activity can now be filtered by tags and people instead of only by date
en.2022_may_new_currencies_description: Blue now supports the Malaysian Ringgit, Egyptian Pound, and the Indonesian Rupee
en.2022_may_self_extend_trials_description: If new potential customers need to extend their free trial, they can now do it by themselves without having to reach out to the customer support team!
en.2022_november_company_map_view_descripti: You can now view geographic data from multiple projects from one convenient location
en.2022_november_create_tags_directly_from_: Previously, you could only create a tag from within a Record. Now, you can do this directly with the project tag filter
Create Tags Directly from Tag Filters
en.2022_november_forms_qr_code_description: You can now download a QR code for every form in the form share options
en.2022_november_new_database_description: Blue now runs on an entirely new database structure. Write speeds increased by 50%, while read speeds are up over 100%
en.2022_october_automations_v2_description: We're adding two new triggers (On Due Date Expiration and When Anyone Is Assigned) and several new actions such as moving Records to other projects, copying Records, and also the creation of checklists!
en.2022_october_blue_docs_description: Create an unlimited amount of real-time documents in any project
en.2022_october_date_custom_field_descripti: Sometimes you need more than one date per Record. With our new custom field you can add as many dates as you need!

en.2022_october_templates_v2_description: Templates are now even more powerful, they support Automations, Custom Fields, and Checklists
en.2022_october_webhooks_description: Trigger events in third party applications automatically using Blue webhooks, which are filterable by project and by type of event
en.2022_september_dependecies_description: Mark Records as blocked by other Records, or as blocking other Records. This is the first step towards Gantt Charts
en.2022_september_improved_project_activity: Project activity now logs deleted Record lists as well as form submissions
en.2022_september_right_click_records_descr: Sometimes you need to edit a Record, fast. Now you can ‚Äî just right click on a Record
en.2022_september_show_percentage_on_checkl: We now display the % completion of checklists based on the number of items completed
en.2023_april_dashboard_pie_charts_descript: Show your cross-project data in beautiful pie charts that update in realtime
en.2023_april_footer_for_forms_description: You can now add footers to form, which is perfect for terms and conditions
en.2023_april_improvements_to_single_and_mu: We now support up to 100,000 items with infinite scroll, type-as-you-search, and bulk import
Improvements to Single and Multi-Select Field
en.2023_april_submission_times_on_form_entr: We now show the precise time when forms were submitted
en.2023_august_bar_charts_description: Take your data and do cross-project time-series analysis
en.2023_august_chat_description: Every project now gets a multi-topic chat
en.2023_august_cross_project_references_des: Show data from one project into another project
en.2023_august_timeline_gantt_charts_descri: View your projects as a Gantt Charts, which allows you to visualise all the dependencies and interconnections between your Records
en.2023_december_customisable_date_format_d: Users can now choose between dd/mm/yyyy and mm/dd/yyyy in their profile
en.2023_december_print_records_as_pdfs_desc: Upload PDFs as template and then overlay custom fields and print specific records as PDFs
en.2023_february_create_list_from_list_menu: You can now create lists to the left or right of any existing list
en.2023_february_custom_permissions_descrip: Create granular project permissions to unlock new use cases like never before
en.2023_february_improved_bulk_actions_desc: Bulk Record List actions now respect active filters
en.2023_january_cross_project_automations_d: We now allow Records that are moved across projects to trigger automations
en.2023_january_dashboards_stats_card_descr: Turn your data into knowledge with dashboards. Query across projects to surface key insights about your organisation

en.2023_july_copy_charts_between_dashboards: You can now easily create new dashboards by copying charts from other dashboards
en.2023_july_filter_by_list_description: You can now filter by list in company map view and dashboards
en.2023_july_new_languages_description: Blue is now available in Japanese, Hindi, Bengali, and Marathi
en.2023_july_raised_import_limits_descripti: You can now import up to 100,000 items into Blue in one go
en.2023_july_system_upgrade_description: We've made a major system upgrade to make our platform even faster
en.2023_june_ai_document_chat_alpha_descrip: You can now search and chat within any PDF inside of Blue. This is great to understand long and complex documents
en.2023_june_bonjour_description: Our mobile apps are now available in French!
en.2023_june_custom_permissions_for_lists_d: You can now decide which lists different roles can see in your projects
en.2023_june_notifications_for_form_submiss: Now form submissions can trigger notifications via email and push
en.2023_june_share_dashboards_description: You can now share dashboards with anyone that is already in your organisation
en.2023_march_improved_logging_description: We're now logging and monitoring even more aspects of our infrastructure
en.2023_march_improved_mentions_description: We have upgraded our @mentions to be significantly faster and more scalable than before
en.2023_march_ipad_app_description: If you use an iPad, you can now have a dedicated and beautiful app that leverages all that extra screen real-estate
en.2023_march_new_real_time_engine_descript: We have completely rewritten our real-time engine to make it faster and more performant
en.2023_november_conditional_automations_al: Create advanced conditional automations to enable even more use cases
en.2023_november_docs_in_templates_descript: Project templates now include associated documentation, making it easier to maintain consistent processes and onboard new team members

en.2023_september_record_colours_descriptio: Right click to colour code your Record cards, this makes it easy to highlight specific Records in your board!

en.2024_april_ai_summaries_description: One-click to get summaries of all comments inside a record

en.2024_april_hide_record_counts_descriptio: Project admins can now choose to hide the record count next to list names within project settings
en.2024_april_instant_delete_description: Deleting a record now is instant
en.2024_april_next_gen_search_description: We've rewritten the search experience from scratch. Find anything ‚Äî instantly
en.2024_august_add_columns_in_database_view: You can now add columns (i.e. custom fields!) directly in the database view
en.2024_august_add_records_in_database_view: You can now add records directly in the database view
en.2024_august_added_support_for_loom_video: Loom videos now automatically embed when you comment a link to a Loom video
en.2024_august_bulk_project_invites_descrip: Now you can invite users to multiple projects at the same time
en.2024_august_new_currencies_description: We've added support for the Georgian Lari (GEL), the Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR), and the Moroccan Dirham (MAD)
en.2024_december_api_record_creation_upgrad: Create records with custom field values directly through the API for seamless integrations
en.2024_december_enhanced_button_custom_fie: Create buttons with soft/hard confirmation dialogs that can trigger automations upon activation
en.2024_december_international_phone_number: Added automatic recognition of international phone number formats during CSV imports for better data standardization
en.2024_december_location_field_csv_support: Added import/export capability for location custom fields in CSV format

en.2024_december_pdf_automation_pipeline_de: Automatically store generated PDFs in file fields and trigger automations on PDF generation
en.2024_february_select_multiple_records_de: Control/Command + click to select multiple records and then right click for bulk actions

en.2024_january_csv_export_with_filters_des: You can now export only records that are visible based on your active filters
en.2024_january_new_blue_brand_description: We have redesigned our Blue Wordmark from our previous custom cursive font to a sans-serif
en.2024_january_new_documentation_site_desc: We've launched a new documentation site with AI-powered search
en.2024_july_form_reference_field_dropdown_: Forms now support reference custom fields as single or multi select dropdowns
en.2024_july_gpt_4o_mini_description: We've updated our AI features to use the latest and most powerful AI models
en.2024_july_keyboard_shortcuts_description: Now you can navigate around Blue using your keyboard for common actions, and dropdowns have numbers that you can easily press to take actions
en.2024_july_multi_language_support_for_pri: Now our print PDF feature support characters in multiple languages
en.2024_july_send_emails_to_referenced_emai: Now email automations can send emails to emails that are referenced from another project
Send emails to referenced email fields
en.2024_june_font_selection_alpha_descripti: Users can choose between various Google fonts for their Blue interface
en.2024_june_gantt_chart_improvements_descr: We've made Gantt Charts smoother to use, and have also added a quarterly view, which is often the perfect view to focus on corporate planning
en.2024_june_multi_language_ai_summaries_de: AI Summaries now support multiple languages instead of just English. We automatically detect the language and create summaries in the same language!
en.2024_june_search_improvements_descriptio: We've improved our search algorithms and we also prioritize results in the current project
en.2024_june_see_where_records_are_referenc: If a record is referenced, you can see a list of all places it has been referenced right from the individual record view
en.2024_march_lookup_a_lookup_description: Lookup custom fields can now lookup other lookup custom fields
en.2024_march_mentions_groups_description: You can now @mention user groups such as clients, team members, and even custom user roles
en.2024_march_new_support_beacon_descriptio: We have a new support beacon that can be opened by pressing \
en.2024_may_auto_tagging_using_ai_descripti: You can now automatically tag records using AI either individually or in bulk
en.2024_may_chat_improvements_description: We've made dozens of small but noticeable improvements to our chat interface

en.2024_november_enhanced_lookup_fields_des: Lookup fields can now reference other reference fields, enabling more complex cross-project data relationships and advanced reporting capabilities
en.2024_november_google_maps_integration_de: Location fields now include direct links to Google Maps, allowing for easier navigation and location sharing across teams
en.2024_november_referenced_by_field_descri: A new column in Database View shows all places where a record is referenced, providing better visibility into data relationships across your projects
en.2024_october_button_custom_field_descrip: You can now create custom fields that act like buttons, which can trigger automations

en.2024_october_updated_calendar_view_descr: We've updated our calendar view to make it easier to read and more informative
en.2024_september_improved_search_functiona: Our search feature has been enhanced to provide faster and more accurate results across all your projects and Records
en.2024_september_new_languages_description: We've added support for Bengali, Dutch, Hindi, Norwegian, Polish, Swahili, Tagalog, Tamil, Thai, and Turkish, making Blue even more accessible globally

en.2025_april_add_support_for_multi_page_pd: You can now create multi-page PDF templates for printing
Add support for multi-page PDF templates
en.2025_april_add_support_for_uniqueid_on_p: UniqueIDs can now be overlayed in the PDF templates for printing
Add Support for UniqueID on PDF Printing
en.2025_april_automation_to_assign_to_the_p: You can now assign a record to the person who triggered the automation
Automation to assign to the person who created the record
en.2025_april_custom_field_folders_descript: Custom fields can now be organized into folders, making it easier to manage and find them
en.2025_april_faster_record_queries_descrip: A complete rewrite of our record fetching query to significantly improve speed
en.2025_august_clickable_url_field_descript: URL fields in record activity are now clickable, allowing you to instantly visit links without copying and pasting
en.2025_august_multiple_automation_emails_d: Automations now support sending up to 5 emails per automation to different email addresses, enabling more comprehensive workflow notifications
en.2025_august_tags_in_forms_beta_descripti: support for tags in forms - you can now add tag fields to your forms for better categorization of submissions
en.2025_august_video_player_comments_descri: Uploaded videos in comments are now playable with a preview player, making it easier to view video content without downloading
en.2025_february_currency_conversion_custom: Create a custom field that converts one currency to another, using the latest exchange rates for the European Central Bank
en.2025_february_custom_field_filters_in_da: You can now filter dashboards by custom fields
en.2025_february_mention_comment_permission: Restrict user roles to only see comments that specifically mention them.
en.2025_february_restrict_project_views_bet: Restrict which project views (i.e. Kanban, Calendar, Gantt, etc.) are available in a project.
en.2025_february_sequential_record_ids_desc: Create a custom field that automatically increments the record ID, useful for creating unique IDs for records
en.2025_january_github_oauth_integration_de: Use GitHub OAuth 2.0 authentication to securely send HTTP requests through automations to GitHub and other services
en.2025_january_google_maps_api_integration: Replace OpenStreetMap with Google Maps using your own API key for enhanced address accuracy in logistics and delivery use cases
en.2025_january_http_request_automation_act: Send HTTP requests to any webhook or API endpoint as an automation action, using any data available in your project records
en.2025_january_project_feature_configurati: Enable/disable and rearrange project features on a per-project basis for tailored workflows
en.2025_january_white_label_add_on_descript: Company administrators can now customize branding with custom domains, white-labeled desktop apps, and company email domains for communications (paid add-on)
en.2025_july_admin_role_management_descript: Administrators can now change the roles of other project administrators, providing more flexible permission management
en.2025_july_created_at_custom_field_descri: You can now create a custom field that automatically sets the created at date for a record
en.2025_july_file_preview_download_activity: Files shown in record activity can now be directly previewed and downloaded in the record activity feed without leaving the record
File Preview and Download in Record Activity
en.2025_july_improved_list_grouping_order_d: Improved the order of list grouping in database view - the top to bottom order now matches the left to right order on kanban boards
en.2025_july_improved_list_grouping_order_t: Improved Order of List Grouping in Database
en.2025_july_multi_homing_records_beta_desc: Have the same record in multiple projects with synchronized custom field data and unified comments
en.2025_july_project_name_email_variables_d: Added Project Name support to email automation variables, allowing you to include the project name in automated emails
en.2025_july_project_name_email_variables_t: Project Name Support in Email Automation Variables
en.2025_july_relative_due_date_triggers_des: Create automation triggers based on relative due dates (e.g., 1 day before due, 1 week after due) for more flexible workflow automation
en.2025_july_sequential_ids_advanced_filter: Sequential IDs are now supported in advanced filtering, allowing you to filter records by their unique sequence numbers
Sequential IDs Support on Advanced Filters
en.2025_june_delete_permissions_for_custom_: Grant or restrict delete permissions for custom user roles
en.2025_june_enhanced_cover_images_descript: Turn cover images off project-wide, set source data (comments, file custom fields, description) and configure aspect ratios
en.2025_june_export_charts_as_csv_descripti: Added a new option to individual charts to be able to export multi-project charts to a unified CSV with combined custom field data.
en.2025_june_file_renaming_description: You can now rename files directly within Blue
en.2025_june_new_file_platform_description: Switched from AWS S3 to B2 for increased bandwidth and files now hosted in Germany
en.2025_june_reference_field_support_for_ba: Blue now supports using reference fields for the X-axis for bar charts.
Reference field support for bar charts.
en.2025_june_restrict_record_completion_des: Control which custom user roles can mark records as complete
en.2025_june_support_for_multiple_email_aut: Now one automation trigger can send up to 5 emails instead of 1 previously.
en.2025_june_wiki_docs_in_templates_descrip: Project templates now include wiki pages and documentation, ensuring knowledge is preserved when creating new projects from templates
en.2025_june_zapier_integration_description: Connect Blue with thousands of apps through our new Zapier integration
en.2025_march_faster_dashboard_charts_descr: We've made our dashboard charts faster and more responsive
en.2025_march_record_color_now_shows_on_dat: The color of a record now shows on the database view
Record color now shows on database view
en.2025_march_sort_database_view_by_date_cu: You can now sort the database view by a custom field that contains a date
Sort Database View by Date Custom Field
en.2025_march_sort_database_view_by_single_: You can now sort the database view by a single and multiple select custom fields
Sort Database View by Single and Multiple Select Custom Field
en.2025_march_time_in_list_description: We've added a new feature that shows you how long a record has been in each list
en.2025_march_upgraded_create_and_update_re: Now you can create and update records using the API while creating and updating custom fields at the same time
Upgraded create and update record APIs
en.2025_march_upgraded_email_infrastructure: We've upgraded our email infrastructure to use a more reliable and scalable provider
en.2025_may_custom_field_folders_descriptio: Custom fields can now be organized into folders, making it easier to manage and find them
en.2025_may_lookup_unique_ids_description: You can now lookup unique IDs across projects
en.2025_may_make_com_integration_descriptio: A native Make application that allows you to send data to and from Make.
en.2025_may_tag_based_permissions_engine_de: Show/hide records based on what tags they have.
en.2025_october_custom_fields_activity_filt: All custom fields are now supported in activity filters, giving you more granular control over what activities you see
en.2025_october_n8n_integration_description: Connect Blue with n8n to create powerful workflow automations across hundreds of applications and services
en.2025_october_restrict_record_completion_: Custom user roles can now restrict users from completing records, ensuring proper workflow control
Restrict Record Completion in Custom User Roles
en.2025_october_unassigned_filter_descripti: New 'Unassigned' filter option for assignee filters makes it easy to find records without assignees
en.2025_september_bulk_actions_automations_: Bulk actions can now trigger automations for up to 1,000 records at once (Enterprise plans only)
en.2025_september_button_custom_field_color: Set custom colors for button custom fields to make them stand out and match your workflow
en.2025_september_checklist_assignment_noti: Checklist assignments now have a separate notification setting, allowing you to control these notifications independently
Separate Notification Settings for Checklist Assignments
en.2025_september_delete_files_folders_perm: Custom user roles can now include permissions to restrict users from deleting files and folders
Delete Files/Folders Permission for Custom User Roles
en.2025_september_forms_assignee_dropdown_d: Forms now support assignees as a dropdown select field, making it easier to assign work through form submissions
en.2025_september_hide_default_fields_descr: Custom user roles can now hide default fields from users, simplifying the interface for specific roles
en.2025_september_hide_default_fields_title: Hide Default Fields in Custom User Roles
en.2025_september_time_in_list_advanced_fil: Time in list field is now supported in advanced filters, allowing you to filter records based on how long they've been in a specific list
Time in List Field in Advanced Filters

id.2018_april_start_description: Kami telah mulai membangun Blue. Kami sangat antusias dengan kemungkinan membantu orang mengubah cara mereka bekerja menjadi lebih baik.
id.2018_august_file_uploads_description: Kami sekarang mendukung pengunggahan file ke diskusi/Rekaman/komentar mana pun. Anda mendapatkan penyimpanan tanpa batas, dengan ukuran file maksimum 100mb per file.
id.2018_august_mentions_description: Perlu memberi tahu rekan tim? Sekarang Anda dapat melakukannya dengan menyebut mereka dalam komentar menggunakan @mentions! Anda akan secara otomatis melihat daftar saran berdasarkan apa yang Anda ketik dan orang-orang dalam proyek.
id.2018_december_performance_improvements_d: Kami meluangkan waktu sejenak dari pengembangan fitur baru untuk memastikan bahwa Blue tetap secepat sebelumnya.
id.2018_december_pretty_urls_description: Sekarang semua URL sepenuhnya dapat dibaca oleh manusia dan ramah di mata, yang berarti bahwa ketika Anda membagikan tautan kepada seseorang, mereka dapat langsung mengetahui ke mana tautan tersebut akan mengarah.
id.2018_july_boards_description: Sekarang Anda dapat melacak daftar Rekaman di seluruh papan dan membangun proses Anda sendiri untuk menjaga semuanya tetap teratur. Ini adalah cara terbaik untuk memastikan bahwa pekerjaan terus mengalir ke arah yang benar.
id.2018_july_mobile_app_beta_description: Kami telah merilis versi beta dari aplikasi mobile untuk Android dan iOS agar pengguna kami dapat mencobanya. Kemampuan untuk bekerja saat bepergian sangat penting, karena itu mencegah Anda terjebak di kantor!
id.2018_june_infinite_scroll_description: Tidak ada yang suka mencoba mengingat di halaman mana sesuatu berada. Dengan scroll tak terbatas, kami terus memuat semua informasi Anda saat Anda menggulir ke bawah halaman.
id.2018_june_projects_description: Sekarang Anda dapat membuat proyek untuk menjaga segala sesuatunya tetap rapi dan teratur, dan yang menarik adalah, setiap akun Blue dilengkapi dengan jumlah proyek yang tidak terbatas!
id.2018_june_status_updates_description: Menjaga informasi tentang apa yang sedang terjadi itu penting. Dengan pembaruan status, Anda dapat melihat apa yang telah dilakukan orang lain serta memposting pembaruan Anda sendiri.
id.2018_may_discussions_description: Sekarang Anda dapat memulai dan membalas diskusi di Blue. Komunikasi adalah aspek terpenting dari kerja tim, dan sekarang Anda dapat melakukannya langsung di dalam Blue.
id.2018_may_passwordless_sign_in_descriptio: Kami sekarang mendukung masuk tanpa kata sandi untuk Blue. Ini adalah cara paling aman untuk masuk ke aplikasi karena tidak memerlukan Anda untuk mengingat apapun.
id.2018_november_automatic_30_day_backups_d: Kami sekarang melakukan cadangan semua data setiap hari selama 30 hari, sehingga Anda dapat tidur nyenyak di malam hari mengetahui bahwa semuanya aman.
id.2018_november_notifications_v1_descripti: Notifikasi browser dan seluler untuk berbagai tindakan yang berbeda, sehingga Anda dapat tetap mengawasi pekerjaan Anda.
id.2018_october_people_search_description: Jika sebuah proyek memiliki banyak orang, sekarang Anda akan menemukan bahwa sebuah bilah pencarian waktu nyata yang berguna muncul untuk membantu Anda menemukan siapa yang Anda cari di halaman Orang :)
id.2018_october_project_and_global_activity: Setiap proyek sekarang memiliki garis waktu dari semua yang telah terjadi. Selain itu, Anda dapat melihat garis waktu dari seluruh perusahaan Anda dan melihat apa yang telah terjadi di semua proyek Anda.
id.2018_september_multiple_companies_descri: Sekarang Anda dapat beralih antara beberapa perusahaan, masing-masing dengan proyek dan orang-orangnya sendiri.
id.2018_september_team_management_descripti: Tambahkan dan hapus orang dari proyek, serta berikan mereka izin yang berbeda untuk memastikan semua orang dapat melihat dan melakukan apa yang mereka butuhkan!
id.2019_april_company_management_descriptio: Manajemen tim di seluruh perusahaan, serta kemampuan untuk mengunggah logo perusahaan Anda dan mengubah perusahaan.
id.2019_april_date_filters_for_activity_des: Kami telah menambahkan kemampuan untuk memfilter aktivitas proyek dan global berdasarkan tanggal, yang sangat berguna jika Anda ingin mengetahui apa yang terjadi pada titik waktu tertentu dalam sebuah proyek.
id.2019_april_increased_maximum_file_size_d: Kami baru saja meningkatkan ukuran file maksimum yang diizinkan dari 100mb menjadi 500mb. Silakan unggah skema besar, video, koleksi foto, dan apa pun yang Anda inginkan.
id.2019_april_multi_language_description: Memberikan kemampuan bagi pengguna untuk menggunakan Blue dalam bahasa asli mereka! Khmer dan Vietnam adalah yang pertama dalam daftar.
id.2019_april_upload_videos_on_ios_descript: Anda sekarang dapat mengunggah video ke dalam diskusi, komentar, atau Rekam langsung melalui aplikasi iOS.
id.2019_august_beta_testing_website_descrip: Anda sekarang dapat mengunjungi [https://beta.app.blue.cc](https://beta.app.blue.cc/) dan masuk dengan detail biasa Anda untuk mengakses semua fitur yang akan datang dan mencobanya!
id.2019_august_leave_a_project_description: Ya...kami tidak memiliki ini sebelumnya dan Anda harus meminta orang lain untuk mengeluarkan Anda dari proyek. Sekarang kami memilikinya, dan Anda dapat keluar sendiri jika perlu!
id.2019_august_per_action_notification_sett: Pilih tindakan mana yang seharusnya memberi Anda notifikasi, sehingga Anda dapat membuat preferensi notifikasi yang dapat disesuaikan sesuai keinginan Anda.
id.2019_august_search_inside_comments_descr: Kami telah meningkatkan mesin pencari kami yang sudah kuat untuk memiliki kemampuan mencari di dalam komentar yang dibuat pada Rekaman, diskusi, atau pembaruan mana pun!
id.2019_august_someone_is_writing_indicator: Sangat mengganggu ketika Anda mengirimkan komentar dan seseorang langsung mengirimkan komentar sebelum atau setelah Anda, sehingga diskusi menjadi tumpang tindih dan menyebabkan kebingungan. Sekarang Anda dapat melihat jika seseorang sedang menulis pada saat yang sama dengan Anda, sehingga Anda dapat lebih baik menilai kapan Anda harus mengirimkan komentar.
id.2019_december_android_app_description: Sekarang pengguna Android dapat menikmati manfaat yang sama seperti pengguna iOS. Kami memiliki aplikasi baru yang menarik dengan semua fitur yang Anda butuhkan, sambil memberikan cara cepat untuk mengakses Blue saat bepergian.
id.2019_december_assignees_faces_on_cards_d: Sekali lihat sudah cukup untuk melihat anggota mana yang ditugaskan pada sebuah tugas, kecuali jika anggota Anda memutuskan untuk tidak menambahkan foto mereka, yang juga tidak masalah.
id.2019_december_checklists_description: Terkadang, sebuah Rekaman mungkin disertai dengan tugas kecil lainnya yang perlu diselesaikan, dan sekarang Anda dapat menambahkan daftar periksa di dalamnya untuk menghindari kehilangan detail kecil.
id.2019_december_improved_record_interface_: Tidak ada yang mengalahkan desain yang mengedepankan kesederhanaan; antarmuka Blue yang diperbarui membuat Records terlihat lebih terorganisir, dan sekarang Anda dapat memindahkan Record Anda ke berbagai kolom melalui opsi dropdown.
id.2019_february_filter_completed_records_d: Ketika sebuah proyek telah berlangsung cukup lama, proyek tersebut dapat dipenuhi dengan Rekaman lama yang telah selesai dan tidak perlu Anda lihat terus-menerus. Sekarang Anda dapat memfilter Rekaman tersebut untuk menjaga fokus.
id.2019_february_mac_windows_app_descriptio: Kami telah meluncurkan aplikasi untuk Mac dan Windows. Aplikasi ini dapat diinstal melalui Google Chrome.
id.2019_february_realtime_description: Setiap kali Anda melakukan sesuatu, seperti memposting komentar baru, itu akan diperbarui secara instan di aplikasi web dan seluler.
id.2019_february_realtime_keyword_filters_d: Sekarang Anda dapat memfilter semua Rekaman dalam sebuah proyek dengan mengetikkan nama, dan kami akan secara otomatis menyembunyikan semua Rekaman yang tidak cocok dengan hasil pencarian tersebut.
id.2019_january_record_filters_sorting_desc: Ketika Anda memiliki banyak Rekaman dalam sebuah proyek, bisa menjadi sulit untuk menemukan sesuatu. Sekarang Anda dapat memfilter berdasarkan apakah Rekaman telah diselesaikan, tanggal jatuh tempo dalam rentang tanggal, dan juga siapa yang telah ditugaskan pada Rekaman tersebut. Dan jika Anda perlu mengurutkan Rekaman Anda, Anda juga dapat melakukannya!
id.2019_january_self_sign_up_description: Sekarang siapa pun dengan alamat email dapat mendaftar ke Blue, dari mana saja di dunia.
id.2019_july_billing_description: Kami telah menambahkan pembayaran yang aman langsung di dalam aplikasi kami, karena kami suka dibayar, Anda tahu ;)
id.2019_july_drag_drop_projects_description: Anda sekarang dapat mengatur ulang proyek di sidebar Anda untuk menempatkan proyek yang paling penting bagi Anda di bagian atas daftar.
id.2019_july_per_project_notifications_desc: Pilih proyek mana yang harus memberikan notifikasi kepada Anda, dan proyek mana yang harus tetap tenang, sehingga Anda dapat fokus pada hal-hal yang penting bagi Anda.
id.2019_july_speed_boost_description: Blue sudah cukup cepat, tetapi kami telah membuatnya lebih dari 50% lebih cepat!
id.2019_july_upgraded_design_description: Kami telah memperbarui Blue ke pedoman Material Design 2 terbaru.
id.2019_june_auto_saving_drafts_description: Setiap pesan yang Anda tulis di aplikasi web atau desktop kami sekarang secara otomatis disimpan saat Anda mengetik, bahkan jika Anda menutup Blue dan membukanya kembali nanti. Ini memastikan bahwa Anda tidak akan kehilangan apapun di tengah kalimat!
id.2019_june_gallery_for_photos_description: Sekarang, ketika Anda mengklik foto pada sebuah komentar, Anda akan disajikan foto tersebut dalam tampilan galeri dan Anda dapat menjelajahi semua foto lainnya dalam Rekaman atau pesan tersebut.
id.2019_june_my_records_description: Melacak tanggung jawab Anda kini menjadi jauh lebih mudah! Kami sekarang mengumpulkan semua Rekaman yang ditugaskan kepada Anda di semua proyek Anda dalam satu tempat, sehingga Anda dapat dengan mudah melihat apa yang menjadi tanggung jawab Anda.
id.2019_june_offline_mode_for_ios_descripti: Anda sekarang dapat menggunakan Blue di iOS saat offline, dan tetap melihat semua data penting yang telah Anda lihat sebelumnya. Ini sangat berguna untuk penerbangan jarak jauh, atau kapan pun internet tidak berfungsi dengan baik ;)
id.2019_june_real_time_search_description: Sekarang Anda dapat mencari semua Rekaman, diskusi, file, dan pembaruan Anda dari bilah navigasi atas. Anda tidak perlu khawatir lagi tentang di mana sesuatu disimpan.
id.2019_march_browser_notifications_reminde: Jika Anda bertanya-tanya mengapa Anda tidak menerima notifikasi, kami sekarang mengingatkan Anda untuk mengaktifkannya di browser Anda agar Anda dapat memanfaatkan Blue (dan tim Anda!) sebaik mungkin.
id.2019_march_icons_for_most_common_file_ty: Blue hadir dengan penyimpanan tanpa batas, sehingga sangat cocok untuk menambahkan semua jenis file Anda! Kami sekarang memiliki ikon kustom untuk lebih dari 40 jenis file yang paling umum, sehingga file Anda akan terlihat semakin baik setelah ada di Blue!
Ikon untuk Tipe File Paling Umum
id.2019_march_ios_app_released_description: Sekarang aplikasi iOS kami telah keluar dari versi beta dan tersedia di App Store untuk diunduh oleh siapa saja.
id.2019_march_pending_invitation_management: Ketika Anda mengundang banyak orang baru ke sebuah proyek, bisa jadi sulit untuk mengingat siapa yang diundang kapan, dan terkadang orang kehilangan undangan tersebut. Sekarang Anda dapat dengan mudah mengelola semua undangan yang telah dikirim, termasuk memperpanjang undangan serta membatalkannya.
id.2019_may_drag_and_drop_columns_on_ios_de: Sekarang Anda dapat memindahkan kolom papan di iOS. Cukup tekan lama pada kolom dan kolom tersebut akan muncul, lalu Anda dapat menyeret dan menjatuhkan untuk mengatur ulang proses atau daftar Rekaman Anda.
id.2019_may_drag_and_drop_columns_on_ios_ti: Seret dan Lepas Kolom di iOS
id.2019_may_email_notifications_for_mention: Ketika seseorang menyebut Anda dalam sebuah Rekaman atau komentar, itu biasanya berarti bahwa hal tersebut cukup penting. Sekarang kami akan mengirimkan email kepada Anda untuk memberi tahu agar Anda memeriksa apa yang telah dikatakan.
id.2019_may_emails_to_aws_ses_description: Kami sekarang mengirim email dari AWS SES, yang berarti email tersebut lebih kecil kemungkinannya masuk ke folder spam Anda, dan Anda juga akan melihat email yang dikirimkan secara langsung.
id.2019_may_play_videos_in_blue_description: Sekarang, ketika Anda mengunggah file video di Blue, kami akan secara otomatis mengubahnya menjadi pemutar sehingga semua orang dapat menonton video tanpa perlu mengunduh file tersebut!
id.2019_may_upload_files_multiple_photos_on: Kami telah mengembangkan fitur unggah foto untuk menambahkan kemampuan mengunggah file apa pun melalui iOS dan juga untuk memilih beberapa foto dan mengunggah semuanya sekaligus.
Unggah Berkas & Beberapa Foto di iOS
id.2019_november_copy_move_records_descript: Jika Anda pernah perlu memindahkan atau menyalin Rekaman antar proyek... Anda beruntung, karena sekarang Anda bisa!
id.2019_november_date_ranges_for_records_de: Kadang-kadang, Rekaman tidak hanya memiliki tanggal jatuh tempo, tetapi juga memiliki jangka waktu tertentu di mana mereka perlu dikerjakan. Sekarang, Anda dapat mengatur baik tanggal mulai maupun tanggal jatuh tempo untuk Rekaman.
id.2019_november_file_management_descriptio: Lupakan Dropbox atau Google Drive, Anda sekarang dapat melihat semua file yang diunggah dalam proyek Anda, serta menyimpan file secara terpisah dari tugas dan komentar, serta mengunduh beberapa file sekaligus.
id.2019_october_bigger_maximum_file_size_de: Kami kini telah meningkatkan ukuran file maksimum menjadi 2GB, yang sangat baik untuk file desain besar, video pemasaran, dan lainnya. Proses unggahan juga menjadi lebih cepat, dan Anda dapat menyeret dan menjatuhkan di mana saja di browser untuk mengunggah file.
id.2019_october_bigger_maximum_file_size_ti: Ukuran File Maksimum yang Lebih Besar
id.2019_october_emoji_support_description: Terkadang kata-kata tidak cukup, dan itulah sebabnya Anda sekarang dapat mencari melalui Emoji untuk menemukan yang sempurna untuk mengekspresikan apa yang ingin Anda katakan!
id.2019_october_per_project_notification_in: Anda sekarang akan melihat angka di sebelah setiap proyek di sidebar, menunjukkan berapa banyak hal baru yang terjadi sejak terakhir kali Anda memeriksa.
id.2019_october_resources_on_the_sidebar_de: Kami telah menambahkan tautan berguna ke sidebar untuk mengunduh aplikasi kami, video pembelajaran, dan lainnya!
id.2019_october_sticky_toolbar_description: Untuk komentar atau deskripsi yang sangat panjang, toolbar sekarang tetap di bagian atas layar sehingga Anda selalu memiliki alat yang tersedia.
id.2019_october_tags_description: Jika Anda melacak kelompok tugas yang terkait tetapi terpisah dalam satu proyek, Anda sekarang dapat memberi kode warna pada mereka dan juga menyaringnya untuk mendapatkan gambaran keseluruhan yang lebih jelas.
id.2019_september_calendars_description: Kemampuan untuk melihat Rekaman dalam format kalender membawa banyak keuntungan, dan ini sangat cocok untuk hal-hal seperti kalender editorial, jadwal posting media sosial, dan lainnya!
id.2019_september_discussion_list_improveme: Kami telah membuat daftar diskusi jauh lebih mudah untuk dinavigasi, terutama jika Anda memiliki sejumlah besar diskusi panjang!
id.2019_september_mark_all_records_in_colum: Anda sekarang dapat menandai seluruh kolom di papan sebagai selesai dengan dua klik. Ini sangat berguna ketika Anda memiliki daftar panjang yang sudah lengkap dan tidak ingin menandai setiap item sebagai selesai satu per satu.
Tandai Semua Rekaman di Kolom sebagai Selesai
id.2019_september_record_history_descriptio: Penting untuk dapat melihat seluruh riwayat setiap Rekaman, mulai dari saat dibuat, kolom mana yang dipindahkan, hingga perubahan nama, perubahan tanggal jatuh tempo, dan lainnya.
id.2019_september_someone_is_writing_indica: Sangat mengganggu ketika Anda mengirimkan komentar dan seseorang langsung mengirimkan komentar sebelum atau setelah Anda, sehingga diskusi menjadi tumpang tindih dan menyebabkan kebingungan.
